page.title: 12STANS'D ST.MARG'TS-HOUSING
page.content: {SQUARES 3711 & 3811. A large roundabout is the centre of {road TRANSPORT}in square six, having 3 major roads leading from it. There is a network of minor roads around a housing estate, the latter, council-built mostly in 1947, being the main{HOUSING}in St. Margarets. The A414 runs east into Stanstead Abbotts, with shops and some housing along it although most of the housing lies further through the village on a low- level plateau. This includes neo- Georgian detached houses with well-to- do residents. Some housing follows the River Lea out of the village. A by- pass is under construction which will alleviate congestion in the village and provide a trouble-free link to the A10.
